biotools.summary:
classifying functionally diverse protein families using alignment score matrices.

the three scripts in this directory comprise ASM-clust, an approach to de novo classify complex protein superfamilies ASM-clust is intended to.

ASM-Clust is implemented in bash with two helper scripts in perl, and will take a protein fasta file as the sole input. Fasta files are processed with ASM_clust.sh, which then:
